ygData.subject: Interesting bug in frontier import.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi there. Thought I would let you all know about a fine bug I found today in frontier import. Follows the relevant log information. Essentially, starts an

Subject: Interesting bug in frontier import.
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=90724651; y=CxmlI7nyQSSzP4fEHNXPeoVfT9Raqt5yQe6jcfl3h6oK
X-Yahoo-Profile: lekash
From: John Lekashman <lekash@...>

Hi there.
Thought I would let you all know about a fine bug I found today in
frontier import.

Follows the relevant log information.
Essentially, starts an import from the action directory.
Reads in 69M uris.
Takes a null pointer exception.
And, does it again, since the action file didn't complete.

Its kind of funny, this one got up to about 360M before I noticed it was
looping and killed it.

Perhaps I shall file a jira issue on it, after I look more to see
what caused the null.  Reading a file just shouldn't do that.

John
